typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadDeleteTechnicalPolicies
ReadDeleteTechnicalPolicies select(mapColumn(
		{$id} = Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$metadata.$model} = 'dtmi:TechnicalPolicy;1',
	{$entityDelete} = 'true') ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_TechnicalPolicies.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesStatusEditor
ReadDeleteTechnicalPolicies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesStatusEditor exists(ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesStatusEditor@Name == StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesStatusEditor@Name,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TechnicalPolicies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesStatusEditor
source(output(
		TechnicalPolicy as string,
		ActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadDeleteTechnicalPolicies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor exists(Name == TechnicalPolicy,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
source(output(
		TechnicalPolicy as string,
		ActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadDeleteTechnicalPolicies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor exists(Name == TechnicalPolicy,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor
source(output(
		TechnicalPolicy as string,
		Criterion as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesCriteriaStatusEditor
ReadDeleteTechnicalPolicies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesCriteriaStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesCriteriaStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesCriteriaStatusEditor exists(Name == TechnicalPolicy,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesCriteriaStatusEditor
StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesCriteriaStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TechnicalPoliciesCriteria_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesCriteriaStatusEditor
